name: BUSTER HOG
description:
3D platform your through some short levels. It's 'definitely' not broken and you 'definitely' don't need to abuse bugs to get through the levels.

[spacebar or a] - jump

[click or b] - dash

[wasd or left stick] - move

MADE FOR THE WOWIE 2.0 GAME JAM

Note: Had more levels planned involving more elaborate use of bugs but please enjoy what I have.
